title: Brain Model-Based Reinforcement Learning Design for Integrating Technology in Higher Education

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level knowledge and practical experience in the relevant field
context.additional_context: Collaborative learning environment using digital devices, with flexible scheduling for working professionals.
